name: Lux Soft Touch Soap
description: Pamper yourself with a LUX Soft Touch soap bar. Infused with moisturising SilkEssence™ and French Roses, revel in skin that's soft and delicately scented. Top Note : Bergamot, Red Fruits, Heart Note: Rose, White Floral, Violet, Base Note: Musk, Amber, Vanilla *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
